description: This file defines the interface IZigWave, an abstract class for ZigBee device management within the WPEFramework. It includes methods for device permission, device information, device enumeration, and binding/unbinding devices.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: An interface for managing ZigBee devices in the WPEFramework, supporting device permissions, metadata retrieval, device listing, and binding operations.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Checks or sets whether a device at a given address can be permuted (permitted) in the network.

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a device with a specified ID.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the list of device IDs currently available.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Establishes a binding between a source device and a destination device.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Removes the binding between a source device and a destination device.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
